version_description:
AGORA OS CARROS COM SISTEMA DE SUSPENSÃO A AR. REBAIXE SEU CARRO ATÉ O CHÃO;
UM NOVO CARRO CHEIO DE SOM ;

AVALIE O JOGO E INDIQUE PARA OS AMIGOS

New fully Brazilian map.
Playable character.
Character can dance.
10 unlockable and fully customizable cars.
Modify the speakers of your car.

A new car added.
Change wheel rim size.
Change the color of xenon.
Open all car doors.
Open car hood.
Turn on windshield wipers
Adjust window height.
Improved character shop and workshop.
A new camera.
Functional Gas Station.
All cars have been redone.
Improved game performance.

A new car added.
Change wheel rim size.
Change the color of xenon.
Open all car doors.
Open car hood.
Turn on windshield wipers
Adjust window height.
Improved character shop and workshop.
A new camera.
Functional Gas Station.
All cars have been redone.
Improved game performance.

Skin for cars
Bug Fixes
Map Improvements
House gates open

Larger map!
Two new cars!
Open doors individually!
Lower windows individually!
Regular opening of the trunk of the car!
Functional GPS! (Click on an icon on the GPS to go to the location).
Functional mirrors!
Improvement at the gas station!
Improved game interface!
Sound at car doors!
Change the car's engine roar!
General improvements in cars!
Mercosur standard plate!
Skin of the firm in SKIN!
Character opens the garage of the houses too!

7 new cars.
Functional sunroof.
Tarps on Pickups.
2 Car System.
Adjust wheel size.
Adjust the wheel "splint".
Manual gear.
+ 11 wheels.
Improved workshop.
Improved menu.
Place the door lining only in the front, rear or both.
Option to choose car traction, FWD, RWD or 4X4.
Improved reel workshop.
Improved Drift System.
New trailers.
Car shop.
Map changes.
Online radio.
